title: “Charlie knew…”: Candace Owens under fire as key witness disputes claims tied to Charlie Kirk shooting
summary_full: Candace Owens faces backlash after Tracy Martin, a friend of Charlie Kirk’s widow Erika Kirk, rejected Owens’ claim that she had prior knowledge of Kirk’s 2025 assassination. In an interview, Martin called the narrative “manipulative” and criticized conspiracy framing. The exchange has fueled online criticism, with many urging Owens to retract her allegations.
